SettingsPanel.title: Settings
SettingsPanel.description: Configure AI provider settings and provide global context for AI operations.
SettingsPanel.apiKeyWarning: Currently, API keys must be configured through environment files (.env.local or .env.production). UI-based configuration is temporarily disabled due to Genkit lifecycle constraints.
SettingsPanel.ollamaServerDescription: Make sure Ollama is running on your local machine.
SettingsPanel.globalAiContextDescription: This information will be used by AI to provide more personalized suggestions.
SettingsPanel.targetJobInfoDescription: Describe the position you're applying for, or paste/drag an image of the job post.
SettingsPanel.professionalBioPlaceholder: Brief description of your professional background, specialties, and career goals...
SettingsPanel.professionalBioDescription: Provide context about yourself that AI can use to tailor suggestions.
SettingsPanel.apiKeyMemoryWarning: API keys are stored only in memory and never persisted. You'll need to re-enter them after refreshing the page.

ImageUploadArea.pasteOrDrag: , paste, or drag & drop a job post screenshot.

AIReviewDialog.title: AI Resume Review
AIReviewDialog.description: Here's an AI-powered analysis of your resume with suggestions for improvement.
AIReviewDialog.noContent: No review content available. Please try again.
